mapper.insert: insert into articlepraise(praise_id, article_id, user_id, praise_user_id) values(#{praise_id} ,#{article_id} ,#{user_id} ,#{praise_user_id})
mapper.delete: delete from articlepraise where user_id = #{user_id} and praise_user_id = #{praise_user_id} and article_id = #{article_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from articlepraise where praise_create_time > (select praise_read_time from notifiinfo where user_id = #{user_id} ) and praise_user_id = #{user_id}
select * from articlepraise where praise_user_id = #{user_id} order by -praise_id asc limit #{start},#{pagesize}
select count(*) from articlepraise where user_id = #{user_id} and praise_user_id = #{praise_user_id} and article_id = #{article_id}
select * from articlepraise where author_id = #{user_id} order by -praise_id asc limit #{start},#{pagesize}
